text: Approval of the Lifeline/ReviveR DDU-100, Lifeline/ReviveR AUTO DDU-120, Lifeline/ReviveR VIEW DDU-2300, Lifeline/ReviveR VIEW AUTO DDU-2200, Lifeline/ReviveR ECG DDU-2450, and Lifeline/ReviveR ECG+ DDU-2475 Automated External Defibrillators. The Lifeline/ReviveR DDU-100 series Automated External Defibrillator (AED) is indicated for use on victims of sudden cardiac arrest (SCA) who are: 1)	Unconscious and unresponsive; and2)	Not breathing or not breathing normally. Lifeline/ReviveR DDU-100 series AEDs may be used with Defibtech adult defibrillation pads (model number DDP-100). For patients under 8 years old, or weighing less than 55 lbs (25 kg), use Defibtech child/infant defibrillation pads (model number DDP-200P), if available. The Lifeline/ReviveR DDU-2000 series Automated External Defibrillator (AED) is indicated for use on victims of sudden cardiac arrest (SCA) who are: 1)	Unconscious and unresponsive; and2)	Not breathing or not breathing normally. Lifeline/ReviveR DDU-2000 series AEDs may be used with Defibtech adult defibrillation pads (model number DDP-2001). For patients under 8 years old, or weighing less than 55 lbs (25 kg), use Defibtech child/infant defibrillation pads (model number DDP-2002), if available.
